articles.title: Brian Wilson, visionary creative spirit for the Beach Boys, dies aged 82
articles.description: Musician, who suffered from mental health problems, wrote and produced the 1966 album Pet Sounds – seen by many as the greatest album of all time
articles.content:
Brian Wilson, the Beach Boys musician, songwriter and producer who created some of history’s most purely beautiful pop music, has died aged 82.

articles.title: The Beach Boys’ Brian Wilson Dies at 82
articles.description: The beloved musician had been living with a neurocognitive disorder akin to dementia
